pages.text: $(l)DISCLAIMER:$()$(br2)$(item)This information may no longer be reliable$()$(br2)Please use the $(l:https://discord.com/channels/1076365835284787220/1085317087112732682)announcements$() channel in discord to keep up to date.$(br2)There is a public system located at $(c:/spawn)/spawn$()!

pages.title: §lGetting Started
pages.text: Converting from RS to AE2 is going to be a big task! We've developed a small guide to help you move your items.$(br2)First and foremost, please check the $(l:patchouli:mods/ae2)AE2 chapter$() for setting up your AE2 system. You will need one before you start moving over items.

pages.title: RS Materials
pages.text: For Refined Storage, you will need an $(thing)External Storage$() at a high priority, a $(thing)Stone Manipulator$(), and a $(thing)Lodestone Core$().$(br2)Add 1 $(item)stack upgrade$() and 3 $(item)speed upgrades$() to your $(thing)Stone Manipulator$()$(br2)This setup $(l)does not$() need to be your RS system.

pages.title: AE2 Materials
pages.text: For AE2, you will need a $(thing)Vibrant Interface$() connected to your new AE2 system.$(br2)Make sure you have glyphstones in your repository!
Example connection with External Storage and Vibrant Interface

pages.title: §lThe Process
pages.text: How do you use the system at $(c:/spawn)/spawn$() or the one you've just made? Continue on the next page!

pages.title: §lThe Process
pages.text: Insert your Refined Storage $(item)Glyphstones$() into the $(thing)Stone Manipulator$().$(br2)The Stone Manipulator can accept 3 glyphstones at a time, but will always transfer items from the top most glyphstone.

pages.title: §lThe Process
pages.text: Ensure the AE2 $(thing)Glyphic Repository$() has AE2 $(item)glyphstones$() that are $(l)not full$().$(br2)The size of the glyphstone depends on you! You can see our recommendations here: $(l:patchouli:mods/ae2#whichAE2)AE2 Storage$()

pages.title: §lThe Process
pages.text: Once all of your Refined Storage $(item)Glyphstones$() are empty, you can move your AE2 $(item)Glyphstones$() to your main system.$(br2)You can repeat this process for any Refined Storage $(item)Glyphstones$() you have!
